ComicInfo.Title: X Part Three
ComicInfo.Summary: It's the end of the "X" storyline,and for Cole Blaquesmith and friends it's a time of fateful decisions and inevitable confrontations. Will Vicki choose Cole over Faust? Has Laslo joined Mambutu's posse? Will Fiona find Cole? And how, exactly, is Fiona alive? You'll find the answers to these questions, the secret to Stonehenge, and more as we barrel toward issue #12!
